# TilemapCel.Tiles property

Gets an Array of Byte elements that represents the raw tile data for this [`TilemapCel`](../TilemapCelType).

```csharp
public Tile[] Tiles { get; }
```

## Remarks

Order of tiles is row by row, from top to bottom, for each scanline read tiles from left to right.
